Articles.Content:
Hello all,

After a long break from ksp i decided to make a aerobatics plane, based off of R/C 3d planes. My planes and do most of the maneuvers shown in this vid:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/DDyRpiv5_ps?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 (skip to 1:50 for the maneuvers). Ill update the thread with pics later if I have any time.
Here are the download links:

[http://www./download/udb78nck7l70a9e/AeroBatics_plane_1.craft](http://www./download/udb78nck7l70a9e/AeroBatics_plane_1.craft) This is the mark 1 it handles bette than the mark 2.

[http://www./download/8h155kdlupb3mx2/AeroBatics_plane_2.craft](http://www./download/8h155kdlupb3mx2/AeroBatics_plane_2.craft) This is the mark 2 its a biplane cause why not?

The mk 1
